00022 //Add a node to the queue
00023 void HighLabelQueue::addNode(Node* node)
00024 {
00025         if (node->getLabel() == INFINITY)
00026                 return;
00027         if (arrayPtr < node->getLabel())
00028                 arrayPtr = node->getLabel();
00029         listArray[node->getLabel()].insertFront(node);
00030         count++;
00031 }
00032 
00033 //Get a the node with highest label
00034 Node* HighLabelQueue::getNode()
00035 {
00036         count--;
00037         Node* n = listArray[arrayPtr].removeFront();
00038         if (listArray[arrayPtr].front == NULL)
00039                 findNewPtr();
00040         return n;
00041 }
00042 
00043 //Find the new pointer to the index with the highest label node in the queue
00044 void HighLabelQueue::findNewPtr()
00045 {
00046         bool flag = false;
00047         int oldPtr = arrayPtr;
00048         int i;
00049 
00050         for (i = arrayPtr-1; i>0 ; i--)
00051         {
00052                 if (listArray[i].front != NULL)
00053                 {
00054                         arrayPtr = i;
00055                         break;
00056                 }
00057         }
00058 
00059         if (arrayPtr == oldPtr)
00060                 arrayPtr = 0;
00061 }

00067 //insert a node before the front node
00068 void HighLabelQueue::DList::insertFront (Node* node)
00069 {
00070         ListNode *newNode;
00071         if(this->front==NULL)
00072         {
00073                 newNode=new ListNode();
00074                 this->front=newNode;
00075                 this->back =newNode;
00076                 newNode->prev=NULL;
00077                 newNode->next=NULL;
00078                 newNode->node=node;
00079 
00080         }
00081         else
00082         {
00083                 newNode=new ListNode();
00084                 newNode->prev=NULL;
00085                 newNode->next =this->front;
00086                 newNode->node =node;
00087                 this->front->prev = newNode;
00088                 this->front = newNode;
00089         }
00090 }
00091 
00092 //insert a node after the back node 
00093 void HighLabelQueue::DList::insertBack (Node* node)
00094 {
00095         ListNode *newNode;
00096         if(this->front==NULL)
00097         {
00098                 newNode=new ListNode();
00099                 this->front=newNode;
00100                 this->back =newNode;
00101                 newNode->prev=NULL;
00102                 newNode->next=NULL;
00103                 newNode->node=node;
00104 
00105         }
00106         else
00107         {
00108                 newNode=new ListNode();
00109                 newNode->next=NULL;
00110                 newNode->prev =this->back;
00111                 newNode->node =node;
00112                 this->back->next = newNode;
00113                 this->back = newNode;
00114         }
00115 }
00116 
00117 //remove the front node 
00118 Node* HighLabelQueue::DList::removeFront()
00119 {
00120         Node* n = this->front->node;
00121 
00122         ListNode* listNode = this->front;
00123         this->front=this->front->next;
00124         if (this->front != NULL)
00125                 this->front->prev = NULL;
00126         else
00127                 this->back = NULL;
00128 
00129         free (listNode);
00130         return n;
00131 }
